# Advanced Topics

This chapter covers more advanced features.

## Mathematics

Typst has excellent math support:

$$
\mathbf{A} = \begin{pmatrix}
a_{11} & a_{12} \\
a_{21} & a_{22}
\end{pmatrix}
$$

Inline math also works: $f(x) = ax^2 + bx + c$.

## Figures

Include figures with captions:

```markdown
![Figure caption](path/to/image.png){#fig-example}
```

Reference figures with `@fig-example`.
